tokensOfLine.text: For example, the shoresh הלך begins with ה
The shoresh הלך produces nouns like הֲלִיכָה (
The shoresh הלך produces verbs like הוֹלֵךְ (

The Hebrew version of the word “the”.text: A ה at the start of a word might be the Hebrew version of the word “the”.

tokensOfLine.text: For example הַאֶבֶן, “the rock,” formed from the word אֶבֶן, meaning “rock.”
